findSql.name: stcw.findLineItemIdActiveOrPendingByReservationNumber
findSql.label: Find LineItemId Active or Pending By ReservationNumber

method.name: cwOnFinderSQLSel
method.script: select distinct lineItemIdentifier from stcw_lineitem where provisioningFlag in ('ACTIVE', 'PROVISIONING') and lineItemStatus != 'CANCELLED' {[4] and reservationNumber = ?}
